content:
equipment

equipmentequipment provides technical details of the equipment and media used for an audio or video recording used as the source for a spoken text. [8.2 Documenting the Source of Transcribed Speech 15.3.2 Declarable Elements ]
Modulespoken â€” Transcribed Speech
